item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: adamantium
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:
Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my website. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)
...or something like this:
The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.
As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

item.title: About AGI
item.dc:creator: adamantium
item.content:encoded:
Building an Online Presence for Businesses

AGI Marketing is an El Paso-based creative team of developers, designers, marketing experts, and writers. We help businesses thrive in the new digital paradigm.

For businesses of all types—local, startups, and mid-size enterprises—it’s becoming more and more difficult to stand out and reach people in the cluttered internet landscape. AGI employs the latest digital marketing strategies, research, and techniques to get businesses visibility and exposure that connects with customers. Our analytical and creative production team work together to build the online presence needed to get your company found online.

The internet marketing industry is constantly changing. It requires perpetual adaptation, tracking, and monitoring. We use our expertise to drive your business to the next level. From applying the fundamentals of Search Engine Optimization (SEO) to creative and responsive web design and development, engaging content, reputation management, pay-per-click advertising, and effective and personalized social media campaigns, AGI infuses your business with new opportunities.

The internet is more than just zeroes and ones; it’s the place where the world connects, shares, and creates. From a dedicated machinist engineering his next coffee roaster in a Nevada workshop to a boutique clothing store redefining fashion in the Sun City to a family medicine clinic treating the sick, or a third generation construction company in Southern New Mexico—AGI is putting local businesses across the U.S on the digital map.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
“Because of the the way AGI has optimized our website in online searches, we are the FIRST company in our industry that people see. This has generated a lot more customers for us!”

Nancy Ontiveros Sarabia’s Portable Jons

Our Mission

Our mission is to connect businesses with new customers. Through SEO, website management, and internet marketing services, we help businesses across the U.S. achieve more. We create. We think big. We find digital solutions.

Our Vision

Our vision is to help local businesses across the U.S. build an online presence and personalized marketing strategy that propels them towards growth and success.

Value System

The AGI code is driven by principles of integrity, trust, teamwork, and respect. We apply these across the board: with our in-house team and with the many business owners we interact with every day.

Why Internet Marketing Matters

It’s more than just business; it’s about people’s lives. When businesses and private enterprises grow, communities prosper, economies are fortified, and families are strengthened. We know the power of effective internet marketing, and we want to share that with hard working business owners all across the country.

item.title: Careers
item.dc:creator: adamantium
item.content:encoded:
Careers at AGI Marketing

At AGI Marketing, our quest for perfection is never ending. We are constantly on the lookout for talented and dedicated professionals to join our team. Our firm is a fast paced and fun environment where creativity and productivity go hand in hand. If you are looking for a challenging and rewarding job, we encourage you to apply for any of our open positions today! If you have a passion for marketing and love to take pride in your work, we are looking for you. If we feel you have the qualifications and personality we are looking for, we will contact you as soon as we can. Available positions:
  • Outside Sales
  • Marketing Campaign Specialist
  • Adwords Specialist

item.title: Dentists
item.dc:creator: adamantium
item.content:encoded:
Digital Marketing Services for Dentists

To maintain a healthy smile, you recommend your patients floss and brush their teeth multiple times a day. The same can be said for your online presence. No, we don’t mean you need to floss your phone or bring a toothbrush to your social media accounts (you probably know this). But your online presence does need to be nurtured and maintained regularly. Plus, as new tactics and skills are introduced, it’s important to keep up with the trends so your business can succeed. AGI Marketing in El Paso can help you do all this and more, so you can gain new patients and grow your practice.

What Does Online Marketing Involve?

Online marketing isn’t as easy as simply having your website up or posting on Facebook every now and then. While these things can definitely help, there’s a lot more strategy involved. For one, there are two main ways you can market your business online: organically and with paid advertising.
  • Organic includes:
  • Optimizing your website to rank on Google & other search engines
  • Writing & posting blogs
  • Managing your online reputation & reviews
  • Managing social profiles
Paid advertising includes: the ads you create using Adwords and paid Facebook ads, which you’d most likely see on the side of the page or in your timeline as you’re scrolling. Adwords ads, which show up on websites, apps, and YouTube videos within the Google Network, include:
  • Search Ads- These are the advertisements that appear above search results when you Google something. They can be used to advertise services, products, promotions, and more.
  • Display Ads- Display ads show up on websites and in apps and are used to promote brand awareness, attract new customers, and make sales. You’ve probably seen one before while browsing one of your favorite sites or using an app.
  • YouTube Ads- YouTube ads can appear before, during, or after a video, on the video screen itself, or to the side of the video. While some of these ads are skippable, they can still have a meaningful impact on interested, potential customers.
  • Remarketing- By using remarketing, you can target ads toward users who have visited your site or used your app. It’s a great way to help them along during the buyer’s journey.
When it comes to successful online marketing, it’s good to cover your bases, keep at it, and keep up with the ever-changing trends. As a dentist, you probably don’t have enough time on your hands to really nurture this. This is where AGI Marketing comes in.

How Can AGI Marketing Help Your Business Succeed?

AGI Marketing is a Google Partner company that is dedicated to helping your business succeed via online marketing. Our team consists of writers, developers, and social media strategists who can help you leverage the internet to your advantage. Gone are the days of phonebooks, and here to stay is this not-so-little place we call the internet. We want to help you ensure your business exists on the web. Call us today to learn more about our services. Meta Description: As a dentist, you work hard to ensure your patients maintain beautiful, healthy smiles. But how can you continue to do so if new patients can't find you online? AGI Marketing in El Paso can help you leverage the internet to market your business, connect with new patients, and stay on top of the game. Call us today!

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
I'd Like to Learn More

[contact-form-7 id="41" title="Contact"]

item.title: Law Firms
item.dc:creator: adamantium
item.content:encoded:
How Online Marketing Can Benefit Law Firms

Being a lawyer means you work in one of the most competitive industries out there. No matter the industry you are in, be it personal injury, criminal, employment, or immigration law, you want your services to come out at the top of Google search results so that when someone searches for legal help, your law firm is the first they see. AGI Marketing in El Paso has helped numerous law firms better their online marketing strategy so they could reach more clients and stay on top in a competitive industry.

How Can We Help You?

We can help your firm in numerous ways. We essentially leverage the internet to your advantage. No one looks up law firms to call in a phonebook anymore. Most people pull out their cell phones and do a quick internet search. If your services don’t come up, chances are, they’re going to find another attorney. So how do we get you to rank in the top results? We do this by utilizing organic SEO and paid advertising to spread the word about your business throughout the internet. We also use tools and platforms such as keyword generators, social media platforms, and more, so potential clients can access your business across the web. Paid Advertising-Paid advertising is another important tool to utilize to market your business online. We can create paid advertising campaigns using Adwords, the Google advertising system. These ads can appear before organic search results, before YouTube videos, and on websites relevant to what your firm does. These ads help build awareness of your firm and services, keep your firm on the minds of potential clients, and convince clients to call in their times of need.

Nothing But Success at AGI Marketing

We’ve helped numerous law firms in El Paso and beyond successfully utilize online marketing, including the Law Office of Cynthia R. Lopez, who has seen incredible growth since being able to rank at the top of the Google results page. We can help you get there as well. Call us today to learn more about our services!

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
I'd Like to Learn More

[contact-form-7 id="41" title="Contact"]

Lawyers are a part of one of the most competitive industries out there, so if you want to reach clients, it's important to utilize online marketing tools and techniques so potential clients can find your business online. AGI Marketing can help you leverage the internet to your advantage. Call us today to learn more.

item.title: Healthcare
item.dc:creator: adamantium
item.content:encoded:
Online Marketing: What Healthcare Providers Need to Know

The way we find and access healthcare is changing concurrently with the way we search for other products and services, such as new clothes or a place to grab a burger, so it’s important that your clinic keeps up with the trends. When someone is searching for a new doctor or specialist, they’ll want to know things like where you are located, when you are open, what kind of insurance you accept, and what services you provide. If they can’t find that easily online, they’re most likely going to go with a different clinic. AGI Marketing can help you get your business online, provide potential clients with all the necessary information, and get your clinic to rank at the top of Google results so people know where to find you. Here’s how.

What We Can Do for You

  • Make You Searchable-Nowadays, the majority of people search for everything online, including healthcare. So if someone can’t find you by doing a quick Google search on their smartphone, you may be losing potential clients.
  • Provide Accurate Information to Clients-We can educate current and potential clients through informative website content and routine blog posts, which can also help your clinic have a higher rank on Google.
  • Develop Your Social Media Presence-Statistics show that many people look up companies, no matter the industry, on social media as well to see information about your services, reviews, and hours of operation. Without a consistent social media presence, you might not come off as reputable or trustworthy.
  • Utilize Adwords-Paid advertising using Adwords, Google’s advertising system, can get your ads on sites, at the top of search results, and before YouTube videos.
  • Website Development and Management-A good website is key to everything. We can design and develop a beautiful website for your clinic and manage it so you don’t have to worry about viruses, outdated info, or being hacked.

The Benefits of Online Marketing

There are multiple benefits to using online marketing, including:
  1. Increased brand awareness
  2. Staying at the top of Google’s results page
  3. Becoming more reputable and trustworthy in the eyes of current and potential clients
  4. Getting your ads in front of clients
  5. Explaining treatments, recovery times, and treatment prep through website content and blogs
  6. Creating a more personal experience for your clients
  7. Gaining more clients and growing your clinic
What Kind of Healthcare Professionals Do We Help? We’ve helped healthcare professionals of all kinds, including surgeons, cosmetic surgeons, dermatologists, radiologists, and dentists. One of our clients of many years, Physician’s Vascular Services, has seen tremendous growth, consistently ranks high on Google, and regularly appears on Google maps, which can be a hard feat to accomplish. We’ve helped them succeed and can help you as well. AGI Marketing is dedicated to helping professionals like you succeed. Call us today to learn more about our online marketing services. Meta Description: As a healthcare professional, you want to be sure your clinic is easy to find, has quality information available on a nice site, and has a great social media presence. AGI Marketing can help you utilize online marketing to accomplish all this and more. We're here to help you grow your clinic by leveraging the internet.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
I'd Like to Learn More

[contact-form-7 id="41" title="Contact"]

item.title: Real Estate
item.dc:creator: adamantium
item.content:encoded:
Online Marketing For Real Estate Companies

Have you ever Googled to see how many real estate companies are in El Paso? There are actually quite a few, so you want to do what you can to be sure your company ranks on top. AGI Marketing in El Paso can help you utilize online marketing so your company can rank at the top of the Google results page.

Why is Online Marketing Important?

El Paso is quite ripe with real estate companies because we have numerous real estate opportunities. From families moving from Juarez to El Paso to people being stationed at Ft. Bliss, El Paso constantly sees an influx of people moving to the Sun City. And when people move here, they’re in need of a new place to live and a company that will help them find the best home for their families. More often than not, someone will find a real estate company to help them by searching for one on Google or through a social media platform. So if your business is not showing up, chances are, you’re missing out on valuable customers and sales. Online marketing utilizes advertising via Adwords, search engine optimization, social media, and more to get your business’s name out there and on the top of Google search results. This way, when someone searches for help, your business will be the one to show up, meaning you’ll gain more customers and sell more homes.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: The real estate industry is a competitive industry, so you want to be sure your real estate company is using online marketing to its advantage. From SEO to Adwords, AGI Marketing in El Paso can help you utilize online marketing to help your business rank at the top of the search results page and earn more customers.

How AGI Marketing Can Help

Maintaining an active online presence can be tiring and difficult, especially with all the work you normally have to do for your company. This is where AGI Marketing comes in. We can help you maintain your website, social media presence (which includes both organic and paid social media postings), search engine rankings through the use of Adwords and search engine optimization, and your directories, such as Yelp and Google My Business. This all may sound like a handful, but it is specifically what we are educated and trained to do. AGI Marketing is a Google Partners company, which means we continuously learn new things, earn certifications, and apply this knowledge to help businesses like yours successfully utilize digital marketing to your advantage. Nowadays, businesses can’t succeed without being “Googleable.” If someone can’t find your business by doing a quick search on their phone, chances are, you’re going to lose their business. Digital marketing is just as powerful as TV ads, radio commercials, and billboards—if not more powerful. If you’re not utilizing it for your business, you are truly missing out.

Get Started With Our Free Internet Presence Audit

If you’re not sure where your company stands in terms of successful online marketing, we can perform a free internet presence audit. We offer digital marketing services to businesses looking to up their internet gain, grow their business, and earn new customers. Call us today to learn more about our services!

I'd Like to Learn More

[contact-form-7 id="41" title="Contact"]

item.title: Home Services/HVAC
item.dc:creator: adamantium
item.content:encoded:
Online Marketing: Why It’s a Great Idea for HVAC Companies

When it comes to owning a business in the HVAC industry, competition is fierce. A great way to get your business ahead of the game is to utilize the internet to market your products and services. AGI Marketing is a Google Partner digital marketing agency that is certified and ready to help you promote your business online.

What Does Online Marketing Involve?

Online marketing essentially makes your company “Googleable.” When done right, you can show up at the top of Google search engine result pages, on Google maps, across social media platforms, and in paid advertising spots. You’ll want to be sure your company is being marketed organically and through paid advertisements while also complying with Google’s policies. At AGI Marketing, we can do that for you and more. Some of the ways we will help you market yourself online include:
  • Building a great website
  • Optimizing your site to be Google Friendly
  • Posts across multiple social media platforms
  • Facebook ads
  • Adwords advertising campaigns
  • Regular blog posts
  • Strong website content
What does this mean for you?
  • More phone calls
  • More contact submissions
  • More foot traffic
  • More online traffic
  • More business!
Marketing your business online is important because that’s how most potential clients will find you. Nobody picks up a phonebook anymore. They find businesses by Googling them. When someone’s air conditioner stops working in the middle of the summer, they’re not going to drive around looking for a great HVAC company to help them. They’re going to whip out their smartphones and Google something like “air conditioner repair.” This is when you want your company to come up. With us, it will.

Meet One of Our Clients: Scott Heating & Cooling

At AGI Marketing, we’ve helped numerous clients grow their business by leveraging the internet. We’ve helped Scott Heating & Cooling, an HVAC company, market themselves online by creating an attractive website that’s mobile friendly, improving their social media presence, writing quality blogs, and managing their online ad campaigns. Check out their testimonial below: “We are more than glad to talk about the current marketing company we use, AGI Marketing. We have been a client of AGI’s a multitude of years and are not only pleased with their service, we are now the TOP company in our area and surrounding in the HVAC industry. Anything Internet, social media, IT, and all around tech service - AGI is a MUST!!!!” --Adrian Arreola, Scott Heating & Cooling

How to Get Started

If you’re not sure where your company stands in terms of internet marketing, we can help. Fill out the form on our website and we’ll give your business a free internet audit. Depending on where you stand, we can help you with everything from creating a new website to managing a large ad account. Call us today to learn more about the services that we offer!

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: The HVAC industry is highly competitive, so when someone needs AC repair or installation, you want them to be able to find you online. Our online marketing services can get your business ranked at the top of Google results pages. Call us today to learn more about our services.

I'd Like to Learn More

[contact-form-7 id="41" title="Contact"]

item.title: Small Business
item.dc:creator: adamantium
item.content:encoded:
Online Marketing Services for Small Businesses

“Small businesses are the backbone of the economy.” Surely, as a business owner, you’ve heard this phrase before, whether it’s been at conferences or on classic TV shows like How I Met Your Mother. This is because, well, it’s true. Small businesses accomplish a lot in our world, no matter how small they are. That is why AGI Marketing in El Paso is dedicated to helping small businesses of all shapes and sizes utilize the internet to promote their products and services.

What Our Services Can Do For You

  • Reach More Customers via Adwords
  • Utilize Social Media to Create a More Personal Relationship with Customers
  • Create a Beautiful User-Friendly and Mobile-Friendly Website
  • Help Your Business Rank with SEO
  • Keep Your Directories in Check

Why Should You Use Online Marketing?

If you’re not using online marketing in some way, your company is already behind. Gone are the days of phonebooks, cold calls, and other outdated forms of marketing, and here to stay is the internet. Most people find products and services they need by searching for relevant keywords on Google. They complete searches on their computers, smartphones, and tablets. So if your business isn’t coming up in these relevant searches, you could be losing out on valuable business.

Why Choose AGI Marketing?

AGI Marketing has helped numerous businesses over the years in all kinds of industries. From healthcare professionals and lawyers to private investigators and pumping services, we’ve seen it all. One of our clients, Sarabia’s Portable Jons and Blue Sanitation, has seen tremendous growth since signing on with us. “Because of AGI's input on the digital end and optimization of search engines, there has been a noticeable increase in our web traffic which in turn has impacted our business very favorably.” -Sarabias Portable Jons Our team of writers, SEO specialists, web developers, and graphic designers can ensure your business succeeds. Call us today to learn more!

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: AGI Marketing is dedicated to helping small businesses of all backgrounds, shapes, and sizes utilize the internet to market their products and services. We offer online marketing services to help you succeed. Call us today to learn more about the services we offer and how we can improve your online presence.

I'd Like to Learn More

item.title: SEO
item.dc:creator: adamantium
item.content:encoded:
What is SEO?

SEO, or search engine optimization, refers to the process of optimizing a website to rank as highly as possible for certain keywords within a search engine, such as Google, Yahoo and Bing.

By far, Google is the most commonly used search engine. When you type what you’re looking for in the search bar, the first few results (excluding paid advertisements) are the websites that rank highest in Google’s algorithm. Staying on top of good SEO practices ensures that Google will continue to view your site favorably.

Why Do You Need SEO?

Having a nice website is simply not enough anymore. When your potential customers perform a search for a service or product that you provide, 91% of them choose a business to contact within the first page of the results. If you’re company is not found on that first page of Google – chances are, your customers won’t ever even visit your website. As a business owner, it’s ideal that your business would be one of the first to show in a Google search for keywords relating to your company.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
Search Engine Optimization (SEO)
Be Found When Your Customers Are Searching
“Thanks to AGI, our internet leads & new patients that found us online is more than double the industry average.” Milo Acosta Physician’s Vascular Services

Search Engine Results Page

/SERP/

When potential customers see your business right away, they’re likely to visit your site, read about your services or products and ultimately choose you over your competition.

How We Do It

Google’s algorithm is constantly updating, which means managing SEO is a constant task. At AGI, we analyze every aspect of SEO from choosing keywords best matched for your business to creating optimized website content that helps increase your business.
Our search engine optimization specialists are well-versed in:

• Researching industry keywords that drive traffic
  • Writing optimized content to increase your ranking
  • Internal linking and backlinking
  • Managing your online reputation and reviews
  • Creating engaging social media content
  • Designing a user friendly, modern website

Local SEO

Optimizing for local results is even more competitive, specific and detailed than general SEO. If your company is not properly optimized for your location, you will miss out on potential business. When websites are well-optimized for a specific location, they appear higher within the map section on Google’s search results. If you make the top three spots – also known as the ‘Local Snack Pack’ – your business is visible immediately, with your phone number, address, and distance from the user.

item.title: Social Media Marketing
item.dc:creator: adamantium
item.content:encoded:
Why Social Media?

Social media has taken the world by storm. We use sites and apps like Facebook, Instagram, and SnapChat to connect with friends and family daily.

We use Twitter, LinkedIn, and Pinterest to keep up-to-date in the world of celebrities, professionals, and DIY projects. Because so many people of all ages are already spending time on these sites - as a business, you should too. They serve as an ideal place to promote brand awareness, advertise promotions, and build a positive reputation.

Organic Posting - What is it and why do it?

Organic posts refer to content that is meant to create engagement with an audience. We often choose to make purchases from companies that we recognize. Your company should be familiar and recognizable to both potential first-time and existing customers. Several recent studies show that brands who engage on social media enjoy higher loyalty from their customers, and we also know that social media interaction has a positive correlation with conversion rates. Organic posting builds both brand recognition and loyalty.

What is Social Media Advertising

The recent growth of social media over the last few years has had a significant impact on the world of business. As of 2016, 78% of people in the US had at least one social media account, and 96% of small business owners/marketers were using social media to advertise to potential customers. At AGI, we know that social media isn’t going away anytime soon, so we use it strategically to grow business. We know that there are specific valuable benefits to social media advertising, and we utilize each one. Benefits of social media advertising include:
  • Higher Conversion Rates
  • Increased Inbound Traffic
  • Lower Costs Than Traditional Media
  • Better Measurable Insights

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
Social Media Marketing in El Paso
Engaged Customers & Communicate Efficiently

“The campaigns AGI runs for us on Facebook and other social media generate tons of new customers for our sales events every time.”
Glen Morris National Furniture Liquidators

How We Target People on Facebook

Facebook is the most widely used social network in the world, and chances are, your target audience is using it every day.
Facebook now allows users to target advertisements based on several factors including:

We even have the ability to target specific locations based on state, city, zipcode, neighborhood or radius. With the ability to specifically target potential customers, Facebook has become an excellent marketing tool, and AGI has the skill and expertise to use it effectively.

item.title: Remarketing
item.dc:creator: adamantium
item.content:encoded:
What is Remarketing?

Remarketing, also known as retargeting, is a way to advertise to people who have previously visited your site or used one of your apps. Many times, when a potential customer visits your site, they don’t buy something—contrary to what you’d hope. Maybe they decide they’ll come back after payday or will ask for it as a gift. This is great, but oftentimes, customers forget. Remarketing allows you to show your ads to people who have previously visited your website, so you can give them a friendly reminder that they had visited and most likely liked what they saw on your site.

How Does Remarketing Work?

Remarketing can successfully help your company by keeping it in your customers’ mind, meaning whenever they think about whatever service or product your business offers, they’ll think of your company first. From completing a sale to reminding potential customers that your company is there and ready to help, remarketing is a great tool to grow your business. Using Adwords, we can create different campaigns that will get your ads in front of audiences across the Google Network, which includes sites and apps that allow Google to place your ads on them. We can also make specific remarketing lists to narrow down who you want to target. For example, if someone visited your website, put something in their online shopping cart, but didn’t go through with the purchase, we can target them specifically. Or we can be broader and simply target people who have just visited your site.

Why is Remarketing Important?

Have you ever walked into a room and then forgotten why you were going to that room in the first place? Well, scientists have figured out that our brains rewire themselves to adjust walking through doorways, which is why we tend to forget. And while it hasn’t been scientifically proven yet, we wouldn’t be surprised if the same were true for opening new tabs in our web browsers. Have you ever tried to do some online shopping but then got distracted and never went through with your purchase? Maybe you opened a new tab and fell down another internet wormhole. This seems to happen quite often, which is why remarketing is so important. Remarketing reminds customers that you and your business are there, ready to help them when they need your product or service. And since they’ve already visited your website, they’ll be more likely to make a purchase or request your services.

AGI Marketing is Here to Help You!

Managing your online campaigns, strategizing, and utilizing remarketing can take up a lot of time, which isn’t a great thing when you’re busy managing your company. AGI Marketing can help you utilize remarketing, so you can target more potential customers and grow your business. Call us today to learn more about our digital marketing services!

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Remarketing works by targeting and showing ads to customers who have previously visited your website, used one of your apps, or watched a video on your YouTube channel. AGI Marketing in El Paso can help you utilize remarketing to grow your customer base and make more sales. Contact us today to learn more!

I'd Like to Learn More

[contact-form-7 id="41" title="Contact"]

item.title: Pay Per Click Advertising
item.dc:creator: adamantium
item.content:encoded:
Pay Per Click Advertising in El Paso

Have you ever Googled something, like “insoles” or “roof repair,” and had ads appear at the top of the page, right before maps and other results? The answer is probably yes, right? These ads are a newer, innovative way of advertising your products and services directly to your customers. AGI Marketing in El Paso can help you master pay per click advertising.

What is Pay Per Click (PPC)?

Pay per click advertising utilizes search engines and web pages such as Google and Bing to show your ads. One thing that makes PPC advertising different from traditional advertising is that you pay only when someone clicks on your ad. While a traditional ad may require you to pay just to advertise anything at all, you’ll only be charged when someone clicks on your ad. You pay for results.

How it Works

Pay per click advertising works by taking you to the top of search engine page and earning you more visitors to your site than you might get organically. We create PPC ads for Google using Google Adwords. Google Adwords allows users to create different types of ads, such as the ones found at the top of search engine results. When creating a PPC ad, users can add keywords, goals, and budgets to create a successful ad. Using other tools, like Google Analytics, we can track and measure the success of the campaigns. Since the cost is based on clicks, you can set a budget for each day, meaning if you reach your budget limit for the day, Adwords will remove your ads for the remaining amount of time. This helps you manage your budget wisely.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
Pay Per Click (PPC)
Position Yourself to Be On Top of Google With Paid Ads

AGI responds quickly to all attacks on our business’s credibility. And they make sure our online image is absolutely stellar!

Adrian Arreola Scott Heating and Cooling

What Does AGI Do with PPC?

While it may sound easy enough, working with PPC takes a lot of industry knowledge, which is why it’s often best to let the pros handle it. At AGI Marketing, we make sure to put out the best PPC ads for your company in numerous ways. We begin with keyword research. When building your ad campaign through Adwords, we have to add keywords, and we determine which keywords to add through proper research. These keywords help land your ad in the top results. Once ads are running and whenever a new campaign is created, we are sure to update the keywords as need be. We also work to create the best ads for your industry, services, and products. From the copy to the ad extensions (which allow you to display your location, phone number, products, and more), we ensure the ad is perfect for you. And if the ad isn’t doing too hot or could be improved, we are sure to go in regularly to tweak and update it. This is good because your ad’s performance doesn’t just depend on your company. It can be affected by other companies’ ads and industry trends. We stay on top of it so you don’t have to. But you don’t want just your ads to look good. Imagine seeing an ad for a pair of shoes you think are really nice, but when you click on it, it takes you to a poorly made site that, quite frankly, looks pretty shady. If a customer were to click on your ad and it sent them a strange-looking site, they might be inclined to not use your services or buy your products. You want to be sure the landing pages they are going to are well-designed and efficient. As a digital marketing agency, we can design a website so the landing pages are all good to go. One thing to note about PPC is that, unfortunately, you can’t just enter things in properly and have it all magically work out. In order to have your ads on Google search engine results pages, you have to bid on keywords, but this doesn’t work like a standard auction. Both the quality of your ad and how much you bid on keywords will determine your rank on Google. But that doesn’t mean you should just bid as high as you can. This can cost you thousands and thousands of dollars and can negatively affect inflation on bidding.

Why it Works

PPC advertising works because it allows you to target your advertising strategies, it’s cost effective, and it works on both desktop and mobile searching. On top of that, it leverages the internet. Most people search for things they need on the internet, rather than waiting to see and hear tv and radio ads. If you’re looking to expand your reach, gain new customers, and utilize an innovative marketing tactic, PPC ads are for you. AGI Marketing can help you build successful pay per click campaigns. Call today! Meta Description: Pay per click advertising is the latest and greatest in advertising. AGI Marketing in El Paso can help you utilize Adwords and PPC ads to target more customers and leverage the internet to market your services and products. Call us today to learn more about PPC.

item.title: Online Reputation Management
item.dc:creator: adamantium
item.content:encoded:
What Exactly IS Online Reputation Management?

The term “online reputation management” means various things to different people. Some believe ORM is simply monitoring social media accounts, others think reputation management is a public relations concern, and others don’t really care because they don’t see how it could possibly impact sales anyway. Unfortunately, these perspectives couldn’t be less accurate. In today’s business and media landscape, companies of every size and industry can benefit from comprehensive online reputation management. Essentially, online reputation management means taking control of the conversation about your company online. The goal of ORM is to maintain balance, counteract negativity, and build a positive standing online. While this includes managing activity on social media, it also means ensuring that your company has a positive reputation on directories and community sites. For example, it’s important to build a wealth of positive reviews on websites like Google, Yahoo, Yellow Pages, Bing, Yellowbook, etc. As consumers, we rely heavily on others’ opinions of a product or service.When potential customers search your company, they should see positive ratings and comments from your previous clients.

Why is Online Reputation Management Important to El Paso Businesses?

In recent years, El Paso has grown immensely and the number of local businesses has also increased. Now more than ever, El Pasoans have plenty of options for products and services. That being said, many businesses miss out on customers because they have bad reviews online or they are nowhere to be found when a prospective customer uses a search engine. It’s imperative that businesses in El Paso have a prominent and positive reputation online. As the majority of us now use smartphones, it’s become increasingly common for people to search for a company directly on their mobile device. An excellent Google review shows when consumers search on Google Maps. Potential customers can immediately see your high rating and get directions to your location with one click. This is incredibly valuable in a culture that is always on the go, and especially in a community with so much to offer.

How Can I Manage What People Say About my Company?

The fact is that your customers are talking. They’re tweeting about your product, commenting on your blog, and reviewing you on Facebook. The goal is to make sure they’re saying good things. One bad review can bring down your average substantially. It’s important to not only address negative comments with helpful and transparent responses, but to balance them out with excellent reviews from satisfied customers. When it comes to your business online, not having any reviews is very detrimental. Ideally, your business should be present in many places online, and it should look good in all of those places. AGI manages your company’s online reputation by reaching out to previous customers and adding positive reviews to Google and other platforms. We ensure that any and every negative comment is met with kindness and professionalism, and we confirm accurate information about your business on all major online directories. We also manage your social media profiles and blog in addition to your website. We specialize in search engine optimization, and all of our clients benefit from the best possible online marketing practices. As a Google Partner, we understand the importance of a high quality online reputation and how it can skyrocket business. Contact us today to find out more about your company’s online potential.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: First impressions are a huge deal! Online reputation management can put your company's best foot forward and reach potential customers with one click.

item.title: Digital Marketing
item.dc:creator: adamantium
item.content:encoded:
Is Digital Marketing Relevant to El Paso Businesses?

Digital marketing, or digital advertising, is a blanket term that refers to the use of the internet to grow business. In today’s world, much of what we do is online.

We shop, talk, and learn online, and we form our opinions about people, places, and products based on what we see about them on the internet. The internet has rapidly grown as the most prominent place for advertising, passing traditional TV, radio, billboard, and paper methods. Advertising online involves several elements including search engine optimization, social media, video, directory optimization, web design, and email. Each of these is broken down into several parts. For example, social media itself can include a number of different accounts including Facebook, Instagram, Google Plus, LinkedIn, Twitter, Pinterest, and other relevant sites. Unfortunately, because there are many different facets of online marketing, it can become difficult for just one person at your business to try to keep up. This is why it’s a good idea to consider hiring a team that specializes in online marketing so that you can focus on the important parts of your business.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Since AGI takes care of my digital marketing, I rest easy knowing that my professional image and credibility are well-managed. People looking for our services KNOW we are the BEST. Cynthia R. López Cynthia R. López, P.C.

Why Should I Use Digital Marketing for My Local Business?

Flexibility

Since online advertising is a big commitment, it’s important to know why it’s worth it to take the plunge. The biggest advantage to online marketing in El Paso is flexibility. Unlike other forms of advertising, online content can be quickly and easily updated on a frequent basis to best represent the message you’d like to convey. The internet is also a tool that can be customized to target the best possible audience for your business. For example, certain social media sites and particular kinds of ads are more likely to reach specific audiences. Unlike a billboard that just about everyone passes on their way to work, messages online are deliberately shown to those who are actually looking for that specific service or product. This, in turn, results in more qualified leads and less wasted time and money on untargeted advertising.

Rapid Pace

One benefit of online marketing over other forms is the pace. Online content can be created and distributed to thousands of people in a matter of seconds, where print advertising, for example, undergoes a lengthy process from creation to delivery. Because of this, online marketing allows for more content because the promotional process takes much less time.

Measurable Insights

Another huge reason to consider using digital marketing for your El Paso business is the ease and accuracy of measurable insights. We can’t possibly know exactly how many people have looked at the billboard when driving by. But with internet marketing analytics, it’s simple to find out how many people have seen your site, clicked on any given link, or even followed your social media accounts. You also have the opportunity to run surveys and interact with your audience in order to gain valuable insight. Unlike traditional marketing methods, the internet allows for a two-sided dialogue with potential customers. Never before has it been possible to get immediate, direct feedback from your audience. This is valuable because it allows you to see which kinds of strategies work best, who’s paying attention, and to get to know your target audience better.

I'd Like to Learn More

[contact-form-7 id="41" title="Contact"]

item.title: Youtube Ads
item.dc:creator: adamantium
item.content:encoded:
YouTube Advertising: How it Can Benefit Your Business

How many times lately have you been asked to watch a YouTube video? Whether it was someone sharing the video on Facebook or showing it to you on their smartphone, you’ve probably watched your fair share of YouTube videos over the years. So why not use YouTube as a way to market your business to potential customers? Even if you, yourself, don’t watch too many videos, there are millions of other people who watch them regularly, even multiple times a day. AGI Marketing in El Paso can help you utilize YouTube to create brand awareness and sell more products or services.

The Various Ways You Can Advertise on YouTube

Have you ever gone to YouTube to watch a video and an ad popped up? Surely, your answer is “Yes.” These ads, while we may be inclined to skip them, are a great way to advertise to potential customers. There are multiple kinds of ads we can run on YouTube, including:
  • Skippable Video Ads- These ads can be inserted at the beginning, middle, or end of a video and are typically longer ads. They allow users to skip the video after five seconds. They’re compatible with both desktop and mobile devices.
  • Non-skippable Video Ads- These video ads come before a video and must be watched before the user can watch their video. They’re usually only 15 to 20 seconds and are compatible across devices.
  • Bumper Ads- Bumper ads are non-skippable ads that appear before the main video and are only six seconds long.
  • Overlay Ads- Overlay ads appear on top of the video themselves toward the bottom of the window. They’re transparent and occupy only about 20 percent of the screen.
  • Sponsored Cards- These ads appear throughout the video to show content that is relevant to what the viewer is watching.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: YouTube advertising is an innovative way to reach the 1.3 billion people who watch YouTube videos regularly. There are different kinds YouTube advertisements to choose from and many ways to get creative with it. Call AGI Marketing today to learn more about how we can help you utilize YouTube to reach more people.

YouTube Advertising
Targeted Video Ads Where You Only Pay For Views

AGI responds quickly to all attacks on our business’s credibility. And they make sure our online image is absolutely stellar!

Adrian Arreola
Scott Heating and Cooling

YouTube’s Popularity Is on the Rise

Did you know more people watch YouTube than they do TV/cable? That’s a crazy change that shows no sign of stopping. In fact, 1.3 billion people use YouTube regularly, making it a great marketing tool. As such a popular site, why not use it to gain new customers?

How We Get Creative With Youtube

We can create videos and come up with good copy so you can reach the most people. Plus, ads can be used to show off your latest promotions, celebrate the holiday season, and more!

Call AGI Marketing Today!

If you’re looking to build brand awareness, gain more customers, and make more sales, AGI Marketing is here to help. We can strategically create different kinds of YouTube ads so you can take advantage of an ever-growing platform. Call us today to learn more about our services.

item.title: Website Design
item.dc:creator: adamantium
item.content:encoded:
What is responsive design?

Responsive website design refers to sites that are developed to automatically adjust to the size of different devices such as desktop computers, laptops, tablets and mobile phones.

These days, we don’t just view websites on desktop computers. Infact more people now view websites on their mobiles phones.

Why is responsive design so important?

At the beginning of 2017 Google announced that they would now be using mobile first indexing to rank websites. This meant that all sites that were not responsive would take a hit to their SEO. Mobile responsive websites are more easily “crawled” by Google, are easier to navigate for potential customers on a mobile platform and include click to call features. All of this increases the likelihood that your website visitors will convert to a sale.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
Responsive Website Design
Beautiful, Google Friendly Sites That Set You Apart

“Thanks to AGI, our internet leads & new patients that found us online is more than double the industry average.”

Milo Acosta Physician’s Vascular Services

Clean, Modern, User Friendly

An attractive site speaks for itself. Your company needs to give just enough information in a way that looks both organized and creative.

Non-responsive sites tend to look cluttered on a mobile screen. The right design is as user-friendly as it is aesthetically pleasing. Your site needs to both attract potential customers and easily convert them, and it should have the flexibility to be accessed from anywhere.
